modName: Sexy Transparent Zipsuit - 7BASE UNPB CBBE BODYSLIDE with optional TBBP support
summary: A very exotic and sexy transparent plastic suit with black zippers. UNPB, 7BASE and CBBE with or without TBBP. Bodyslide version available for CBBE.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img819/7528/j1iu.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img163/5796/0w7z.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/800x600q90/89/d9bk.jpg[/img][/center]


[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img191/18/64d7.png[/img]

-Added UNPB TBBP version.
-Added 7Base TBBP version.
-Due to overwhelming demand, UNPB and 7B version coming soon!
Misc:
-Added non-TBBP version of the armor and bodyslide files.
v1.0:
-Original release


[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img546/9506/hpkc.png[/img]


PLEASE READ THROUGH THIS PAGE BEFORE POSTING ANY QUESTIONS!

This mod adds the Zipsuit armor made by myself to the game. The sunglasses shown is made by Elewin. You can download it [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29432/]here[/url].

It is a light armor and has an armor value equal to dragonscale gears.

The armor can be crafted at the forging station under LEATHER section. Or if you decide to cheat then open console with ~ then type: help "zipsuit" then use player.additem [item number] [amount]

The CBBE body in this mesh is a custom body made by using the BodySlide tool, hence it may differ greatly from the CBBE that you are using. Please make sure you have CBBE textures installed AND TBBP supported skeleton prior to using this. If you don't have the skeleton support your game [B]WILL CRASH[/B]. You have been warned ;) You will also NEED HDT heels system installed. Please refer to the requirements section.

Please check out my other mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48648/]Black Rose - CBBE TBBP[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49350/]Latex Corset - CBBE TBBP with BODYSLIDE[/url]


[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img837/8295/i4xu.png[/img]


[list]
[*]Any TBBP supported skeleton or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/]Textures that will fit the CBBE body[/url]
or
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/]Textures that will fit the 7BASE/UNP body if you choose that version[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/]Most recent version of HDT heels system[/url]
[/list]


[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img59/3353/b1on.png[/img]
Q: Your armor sucks!
A: Thanks for checking it out and bye. Go do something else more productive than to complain in the posts.

Q: Your CBBE body is ugly. You should change it to what I like.
A: Its very subjective. I can never satisfy everyone. If you don't like it, then download the bodyslide version and bodyslide to whatever shape you want.

Q: My game crashed when I tried to equip the armor!
A: If you already have a TBBP compatible skeleton, then Reinstall your skeleton. Some mods like to include their own skeleton and may replace your TBBP-supported skeleton. Also make sure even your custom races have TBBP supported skeleton as well.

Q: Can you please convert to 7Base, UNP, other body shapes please?
A: Sorry no, since I don't use those bodyshapes I don't have any motivation to convert them. Hopfully others will, and if not you can always try to convert it yourself using Outfit Studio.

Q: Can you add more colors to the armor?
A: I tried and it didn't look nice at all. I think transparent and black looks by far the best. If you want to change it so bad, then you can always recolor the .dds files using photoshop or something.

Q: There's clipping when I jump, sneak, run, hump, and make weird poses!
A: Since this armor is very closely layered to the body, it is inevitable that some clipping may occur. I tried my best in fixing all clipping but sometimes the weight copying/painting programs just doesn't want to do what I want. You can let me know and I'll see if I can fix it.

Q: There's clipping when I bodyslided to my custom body shape!
A: It does happen if you go over the values of 100% or have many things at 100%. It's not perfect, sorry but you will have to make your sizes smaller.

Q: Where did you get those sunglasses?
A: Elewin made them. Check out the introduction area.

Q: What hair is that?
A: SG Hairpack. You will have to search for it yourself.

Q: How did you make the face of your character?
A: A lot of creativity and imagination using ECE (Enhanced Character Edit) which you can find here on the nexus.

Q: Will you make your character into a follower?
A: Sorry, no plans so far. Too busy imagining new armors and making them into reality (in game at least).


[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img829/6170/c4qi.png[/img]


[LIST]
[*]Download
[*]Install with NMM or simply drag and drop the files into their respective folders. Overwrite if necessary. (Always make a backup if you overwrite)
[/LIST]


[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img690/8016/nkup.png[/img]


Feel free to redistribute, modify the mesh and fix bugs if necessary but always credit myself.


[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img849/8964/qp5c.png[/img]


Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by Caliente
Bodyslide2 and Outfit Studio by Caliente
Zippers used in the Black Rose armor by N8k
Zipper texture from Dreamstime.com
Heels on platform by newmiller, Apachii and DonMichael71
SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer by Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity
UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT by Blessed Redux Project team
